caption: Attribute Dictionary
description: The Attribute Dictionary defines schema attributes and includes references to the events and objects in which they are used.
name: dictionary

auid.caption: Audit User ID
auid.description: The audit user assigned at login by the audit subsystem.

euid.caption: Effective User ID
euid.description: The effective user under which this process is running.

egid.caption: Effective Group ID
egid.description: The effective group under which this process is running.

linux_kernel_info.caption: Linux Kernel Information
linux_kernel_info.description: Details about the kernel running on the Linux endpoint.

kernel_release.caption: Kernel Release
kernel_release.description: The kernel release of the operating system. Determined from the uname -r command output on Unix-based systems.

kernel_version.caption: Kernel Version
kernel_version.description: The kernel version of the operating system. Given the full version is w.x.y-z, the kernel version is w.

major_revision.caption: Major Revision
major_revision.description: The kernel major revision of the operating system. Given the full version is w.x.y-z, the major revision is x.

minor_revision.caption: Minor Revision
minor_revision.description: The kernel minor revision of the operating system. Given the full version is w.x.y-z, the minor revision is y.

patch_number.caption: Patch Number
patch_number.description: The kernel patch number of the operating system. Given the full version is w.x.y-z, the patch number is z.
